text: Ni tinchaona ŵanganyao ali nkupelechedwa ku walakwe (Motowo), ali ateteŵele ligongo lya kunyosyeka, ali nkulola ni liso lyakusisa (chamunjenje meso). Sano aŵala ŵaŵakulupilile tachiti: “Chisimu ŵakwasika ni aŵala ŵaalijasikasyisye (Mbepo) achimisyene kwisa soni maŵasa gao (lelo) lisiku lya Kiyama (ligongo lya itendo yao yangalumbana yaŵaliji nkutenda ku duniya), manyililani yanti; chisimu ŵalupuso taŵe mu ilagasyo yakwendelechela.”
